long_description: The Mammut Togir Rope Bag protects your climbing rope from dirt, sun and moisture and, with a comfortable shoulder strap, it's easy to carry to the climbing crag. Lay your rope on the large tarp to keep it from getting dirty while you're climbing. Zippered pocket on the side gives you a place to stash extra gear. Padded shoulder strap makes it easy to tote the bag to the crag. The Mammut Togir Rope Bag holds up to an 80m rope.
short_description: The Mammut Togir Rope Bag protects your climbing rope from dirt, sun and moisture and, with a comfortable shoulder strap, it's easy to carry to the climbing crag.
